module.name: Queue Priorities
module.description: Adds the ability to set a callers priority higher before entering a queue
module.changelog: *15.0.6* Bugfix/FREEPBX-20031 *15.0.5* Fixing FREEPBX-17867 *15.0.4* fixing legacy restore *15.0.3* FREEPBX-18351 After adding/editing a Queue Priority entry the page is not redirecting to list page *15.0.2* FREEPBX-15215 Multiple Queue Priority can be added with same Description *15.0.1* Add new Implementation Backup for 15 version.
